column1: The  following  list  of  references  is  just  some  of  the  many  available  resources  that  are  available  to  characterize
information system vulnerabilities, threats, adversary tactics, techniques, and procedures, and methods for assessing
cyber  resiliency.    It  is  not  intended  to  be  a complete  list  of  references  and  each  participant  team  should  perform
additional research when developing their challenge solution.

column2: Cyber Defensive Capability Performance Measurement Development Challenge
b.  Mitre Common Vulnerability and Exposure (CVE) Listing
c.  Mitre Adversarial Tactics, Techniques, and Common Knowledge (ATT&CK)
Mitre Common Attack Pattern Enumeration and Classification (CAPEC)
National Institute of Standards and Technology (NIST), National Vulnerability Database (NVD)
NIST NVD Common Vulnerability Scoring System (CVSS)
